name: Guntlet
description:
Made for the Low Rez Jam 2020.  You are a wizard, beamed aboard an old infested wizard fortress. Find the battery to charge the teleporter and venture ever deeper.

Instructions:

- WASD to move

- Hold left mouse to prepare a Guntlet Shot.  Press right-click to cancelled a prepared Guntlet Shot.

- Press space to dodge. You are invulnerable during a dodge.
